DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To examine effect omega-6 omega-3 fatty acid ratio age-related change executive function child old adult . Participants : Eighty-four typically-developing 7-to 12-year-old child . Procedure ( method ) : Participants caregiver participate 4 session . Three session consist screen . These session telephone call collect 24-hour diet information use determine whether eligible fourth session . Approximately 120 participant screen find 84 participant eligible fourth session , participant complete series test Cambridge Neuropsychological Test Automated Battery ( CANTAB ) - touch-screen device provide computerized version standardize cognitive test . They also complete maze task figure path maze walk correct square . Brain activity record use portable near-infrared spectroscopy ( NIRS ) system .
DOC.brief_title: Fatty Acids Executive Function Development 7-12 Year Olds
DOC.criteria: Typicallydeveloping child 712 year old Children parent speak English Any diagnosis psychological illness History seizures History tobacco exposure gestation History alcohol exposure gestation
